body: Well there are 16 teams  right now who have signed up for the tourney and it is only day 1. Imo this is great as we see more teams joining so I do believe the officials should expand that to 20-30 teams cuz rn with 7 days to go until registration closes who knows maybe another 5 more team joins so yeah :P.

title: May need to expand team registration

replies.body: afaik if the number above 16 is a good one they will expand it. they won't let 8/16 teams out
replies.body_tagged: afaik if the number above 16 is a good one they will expand it. they won't let 8/16 teams out

replies.body:
The Official Team has acknowledged this, and we will be discussing on expanding the team registration cap to fit with our current tournament style soon if need be.
Thanks for the notice tho.
replies.body_tagged:
